channel.title: VIDEO TIP: Duplicate and disable action steps to test changes
channel.description:
Playing with changes to an action and think you might want to revert them later? You can duplicate action steps and disable the old version while making changes.
Disabled action steps are skipped as if they were not there, and can later be re-enabled if needed.
https://vimeo.com/271933263

item.description:
